tweets.text: 5 more breaches!!! @ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgencyMids When are you going to act!!!! #stopthestink #capitoff https://t.co/RpAlwO3lYB

@Laura_James88 @JuliaBradbury @RedIndustries2 @WalleysL @EnvAgency @Tus_M_ @Sotlive Thank you @Laura_James88 as you can imagine tempers are pretty frayed at the moment as there seems no end to this torture and Red Industries treat us with contempt. It is worrying that this will end tragically for someone who sees no other way out.
@JuliaBradbury @Laura_James88 @RedIndustries2 @WalleysL @EnvAgency @Tus_M_ Thank you Julia, noone seems to care that a town is being systematically gassed.

@JuliaBradbury @Laura_James88 @RedIndustries2 @WalleysL @EnvAgency Thank you for pushing on with this Julia. It really is difficult expressing just how horrific this situation is. It impacts me everyday. It actually sticks to material so I often smell it on my furniture even when it doesn‚Äôt smell in the air! It‚Äôs absolutely foul. #stopthestink

@Laura_James88 @RedIndustries2 Hi Laura hopefully you're also reporting on the toxic fumes nightmare that residents are living through because of the @WalleysL landfill site. @RedIndustries2 have been found in breach of permits by the @EnvAgency but residents continue to inhale toxic H2S fumes daily
@Tus_M_

@SarahInNUL @poppers82 @AaronBell4NUL @ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgencyMids @StinkStopthe It's disgusting how this place is still allowed to operate without closer EA scrutiny. Is something underhand going on?

@SarahInNUL @AaronBell4NUL @ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgencyMids @StinkStopthe Stand by for ‚Äòwhilst all landfills produce odours‚Äù statement.  Presumably because that‚Äôs ok then in the middle of a residential area!  Some P45‚Äôs need issuing to these incompetents!

Come and visit us @pow_rebecca - you may reconsider your 'rotting egg smell' comment and realise people of Newcastle-under-Lyme are struggling to breathe &suffering a multitude of health effects as a result of hydrogen sulphide. @EnvAgency dereliction of duty https://t.co/ewXMbpMqAF

Five more breaches makes it 10 this year at Walleys Quarry in Newcastle.

@DefraGovUK @EnvAgency this is from the landfill directive , Could you explain why you won't do this . @StinkStopthe #stopthestink https://t.co/mmSM1LX5a3

This morning NUL was rank. Now my garden is rank. My head thumps. My air is rancid, thick, dense, toxic, filthy and poisonous. @ClareDinnisEA @pow_rebecca @MrNickKnowles @JuliaBradbury @AaronBell4NUL @DefraGovUK @MattHancock But apparently the @EnvAgency has no legal authority.

@JuliaBradbury @RedIndustries2 @WalleysL @EnvAgency @Tus_M_ Hi Julia,
Yes my colleagues at @Sotlive have written - and continue to write - a significant amount of stories regarding the issues around Walleys Quarry.

urls.title: Dorket Head landfill site in Arnold closes over 'smell'
urls.description: A landfill site which kept residents awake at night because the smell was so bad closes.

tweets.text: @SarahInNUL @AaronBell4NUL @ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgencyMids @StinkStopthe It has come to my attention that the Blaydon closure was only temporary, but still, it was more robust enforcement than accepting a voluntary curtailment. Also, I suspect complaint numbers were similarly low for Dorket Head, which was closed permanently (https://t.co/LA0nxaHykq).

@BrazierMary We have reviewed the application to the @EnvAgency for tunnel approval. The document and the supporting reports are missing critical borehole logs and reports around the sensitive R Misbourne crossing locations at Chalfont St Giles and Shardeloes Lake.
@SimonTagg @EnvAgencyMids @StinkStopthe Horrendous last night, still around now, no sleep, gassed form 3 yesterday, still ongoing, shut the place down #stopthestink

@JuliaBradbury @WalleysL @RedIndustries2 @EnvAgency The health implications of this landfill are scary, I live approximately 3 miles away. I was unable to sleep last night, waking on numerous occasions even with an air purifier on. Today I am suffering with a migraine which I have taken prescribed migraine medication for.

Thank you @SarahInNUL for compiling this. @EnvAgencyMids, please can you explain what technical, legal or financial challenges are unique to Walleys Quarry Landfill that prevent you from taking the same enforcement action? We're an understanding bunch, we just want to know why. https://t.co/yBdiMmY6Ag

tweets.text: @CllrCarlJackson @BucksCouncil @ChilternsAONB For over a decade @HS2ltd have maintained tunnelling under the Misbourne #chalkstream will have no detrimental impact on the river and @EnvAgency have agreed. Today @hs2ltd took possession of the river at Chalfont St. Giles for possible mitigation work https://t.co/oUE6J8pMxx

We have reviewed the application to the @EnvAgency for tunnel approval. The document and the supporting reports are missing critical borehole logs and reports around the sensitive R Misbourne crossing locations at Chalfont St Giles and Shardeloes Lake. Why????
